These [93mresults[0m [93mdemonstrate[0m the [93mnanoparticles[0m' [93mexcellent[0m [93mstability[0m, [93mreusability[0m, and [93mdurability[0m. [93mTherefore[0m, [93mAu[0m@[93mAg[0m-[93mPt[0m [93mcore[0m@[93mmulti[0m-[93mshell[0m [93mnanoparticles[0m [93msynthesized[0m [93mvia[0m this [93mco[0m-[93mreduction[0m [93mapproach[0m [93mshow[0m [93mstrong[0m [93mpotential[0m for [93mpractical[0m [93mapplications[0m in [93mwastewater[0m [93mtreatment[0m [93minvolving[0m [93mazo[0m [93mdye[0m [93mreduction[0m.

- [93mExperimental[0m [93mVUV[0m [93mPhotoionization[0m of [93mC[0m([93m70[0m) and [93mVibrationally[0m [93mResolved[0m [93mSpectra[0m of the [93mExcited[0m [93mElectronic[0m [93mStates[0m of the [93mC[0m([93m70[0m) (+) [93mCation[0m.: The [93mnature[0m of the [93mphotoionization[0m of [93mfullerenes[0m is of [93msignificant[0m [93minterest[0m to [93mmolecular[0m [93mastrophysics[0m and [93mastrochemistry[0m.
